content: औपनिषद {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (दी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [उपनिषद्-अण्] {@--1@} Contained or taught in an Upaniṣad; scriptural, theological. {@--2@} Based or founded on, derived from, the Upaniṣads; औपनिषदं दर्शनं (another name for Vedānta <ab>phil.</ab>) --दः {@--1@} The supreme soul, Brahman. {@--2@} A follower of the doctrines of the Upaniṣads.
